an4.9:1.1: “Cattarome, bhikkhave, tanhuppada yattha bhikkhuno tanha uppajjamana uppajjati.
an4.9:1.3: Civarahetu va, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tanha uppajjamana uppajjati;
an4.9:1.4: pindapatahetu va, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tanha uppajjamana uppajjati;
an4.9:1.5: senasanahetu va, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tanha uppajjamana uppajjati;
an4.9:1.6: itibhavabhavahetu va, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tanha uppajjamana uppajjati.
an4.9:1.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro tanhuppada yattha bhikkhuno tanha uppajjamana uppajjatiti.
